attributes.action: allow all hearing impaired people, including totally deaf, who are registered on the nhs the right to claim disability living allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all hearing impaired people whether partual hearing or no hearing, should be allowed to claim a disability benefit, as at present, deaf people are denied a claim to the disability living allowances, which i think should be open to all disabled people, and that they have the right to claim.
